item.title: Cheesy Cod Fish Balls
item.dc:creator: https://www.foodbymaria.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Fish-Balls-5-1440x1863.jpg
item.description:
You’ll find variations of Fish Balls in many places such as New England and Portugal. You’ll also find them in different shapes too like made into fritters or cakes. This popular dish uses cod fillets, potatoes and herbs to make a delicious protein-packed snack that can be served as an appy, side dish, or even a main course when paired with a few side dishes.

The post Cheesy Cod Fish Balls appeared first on FoodByMaria.

item.title: Crispy Greek Pita Bowl
item.dc:creator: https://www.foodbymaria.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Pita-Bowl-10-1440x1863.jpg
item.description:
This Greek Pita Bowl is healthy, delicious, and made in a literal pita bowl! Not only does this Pita Bowl look beautiful but it’s also so tasty and easy to make. Whip up this dish for lunch, or a fresh dinner, and customize your bowl to your liking with your favorite toppings. üçÖ ü•í ü´í üßÄ

item.title: Easy Marry Me Chicken Recipe
item.dc:creator: https://www.foodbymaria.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Easy-Marry-Me-Chicken-Recipe-7-1440x960.jpg
item.description:
This Easy Marry Me Chicken Recipe is a simple yet impressive dish that will win over any heart. üòâ This recipe combines chicken with a creamy sauce that is infused with sundried tomatoes. This dish is tender, flavorful and perfect for serving over a bed of rice or even your favorite pasta. Easy enough for a quick weeknight dinner but fancy enough for a special occasion. You’re going to love this!

item.title: Easy Buffalo Chicken Tacos
item.dc:creator: https://www.foodbymaria.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Buffalo-Chicken-Tacos-6-1440x1863.jpg"
item.description:
Buckle up because these Buffalo Chicken Tacos are going to spice up your weeknight dinner rotation. These tacos have a little kick to them and they’re easy to make. What I love about a taco dish is that they are so versatile. You can make them your own, and even the pickiest eaters in your house can get involved by topping their tacos with the ingredients they prefer.

The post Easy Buffalo Chicken Tacos appeared first on FoodByMaria.

item.title: Sheet Pan Steak Fajitas
item.dc:creator: https://www.foodbymaria.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Sheet-Pan-Steak-Fajitas-9-1440x1440.jpg
item.description:
I’ve been on a real sheet pan kick lately because it’s truly just the easiest way to make dinner. Not only does it save time doing dishes, but I can throw everything onto a pan and have a nutritious meal for Andrew and I ready in no time. These Sheet Pan Steak Fajitas are so easy, delicious, and a great recipe to add to your weeknight rotation.

The post Sheet Pan Steak Fajitas appeared first on FoodByMaria.
